nodes.text: Baktoid Combat Automata, abbreviated BCA, was a manufacturer of battle droids, many of which saw use in the Separatist Droid Army. It was an offshoot of Baktoid Armor Workshop, both of which were owned by the Techno Union. Its factories on Geonosis and other planets cranked out countless battle droids for the Separatists during the Clone Wars. The company was effectively wiped from existence when the Clone Wars ended and the Techno Union was absorbed by the Galactic Empire.[source?]
